EmailTemplate.name: Project Approved IAAO
EmailTemplate.subject: Project Approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
This is a request for approval from the International and Academic Affairs Office (IAAO) for a Foreign NIST Associate to work on a CRADA. NIST and {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Partner__c} intend to work on a project entitled {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Title__c}. Attached is the CRADA Approval Memo that has been approved by the relevant OU. If IAAO approves, this CRADA project will include a Foreign Guest Researcher, [Insert Foreign Guest Researcher Name]. {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Partner__c} is agreeable to including the NIST Associate on the project.
If approved, please respond to this email indicating your approval. Please let me know if I can offer additional information.
Thank you.
